name: James Hoffman Ultimate Clever Dripper recipe
short_description: Clever Dripper recipe by James Hoffman, winner of World barista Championship, YouTuber, coffee consultant, and author. [Watch the tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RpOdennxP24).

steps.description: Insert the paper filter into CLever Dripper and rinse it with water. Grind the coffee, but don't put into Clever Dripper yet. Place on scale and zero it out.
Add <final_water_amount>g. of water to the Clever Dripper
Put the coffee in the water and stir it a little with a spoon.
Let the coffee steep for 2 minutes.
Stir with a spoon or shake the brewer a little to break the crust.
Place the Clever Dripper on a server and wait for the complete drawdown.

name: Clever Dripper recipe by European Coffee Trip
short_description: Clever Dripper recipe by Youtube channel European Coffee Trip. Here's the [tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H4-XTUpX9Mo).

steps.description: Place the paper filter into the Clever dripper, rinse it with hot water. Grind the coffee and put the grounds in the brewer.
Add <final_water_amount>g of water to the brewer.
Gently break the crust on the top with spoon.
Place the clever Dripper on the carafe and let the coffee drain.

name: Clever Dripper recipe by Coffee and Water
short_description: Clever Dripper recipe by Youtube channel Coffee and Water. Here's the [tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gyZ7Zvvl3uk).

steps.description: Place the paper filter into the Clever dripper, rinse it with hot water. Grind the coffee and put the grounds in the brewer.
Add <final_water_amount>g of water to the brewer.
Break the crust on the top of the brew with spoon, stirring 3 times.
Place your clever Dripper on the carafe and let the coffee drain.
